name: save santa (itch) (castiella, Roarizayoi, sahinyu, buldubu)
description:
Santa has been in an accident and crushed into a tree. He is trapped there and without him, there is no christimas. To bring christmas back, you must save him from on top of the tree. 

Creators: Yusuf Hüseyin Şahin, Aybike Zeynep Taşkın, Kadir Burak Buldu,  Ömer Filiz
